attributes.action: have imagrants deported home if they are not contributing to the economy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i belive all imagrants who are able to work should be in work within a 6 month period, or deported home, cause why should british taxpayers fund people of non britsh citizenship for staying here in the uk, action must be taken to ensure that uk citizens are put firts

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=immigrants
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
